name: Glentham Life Sciences - Beta-Sitosterol 97%
description: Glentham Life Sciences is a fine chemicals manufacturer and supplier offering Beta-Sitosterol with 97% purity. This high-purity phytosterol serves as a natural cholesterol alternative for barrier repair formulations, providing anti-inflammatory and barrier-supporting benefits.
notes: Fine chemicals manufacturer ensures high quality and purity. 97% purity specification provides excellent performance. CAS 83-46-5. Beta-sitosterol is primary phytosterol for barrier repair applications.
